price: Nanso wͻn gyidie no ho amma mfasoͻ amma wͻn wͻ εberε a wͻhunuu Y’asotwee no. (Saa na) Nyankopͻn kwan a watwa ato hͻ ama nenkoa no (siteε), na εhͻ deԑ na boniayεfoͻ no abrε agu.
arabic: فَلَمۡ يَكُ يَنفَعُهُمۡ إِيمَٰنُهُمۡ لَمَّا رَأَوۡاْ بَأۡسَنَاۖ سُنَّتَ ٱللَّهِ ٱلَّتِي قَدۡ خَلَتۡ فِي عِبَادِهِۦۖ وَخَسِرَ هُنَالِكَ ٱلۡكَٰفِرُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: falam yaku yanfaʿuhum īmānuhum lammā ra-aw basanā sunnata al-lahi allatī qad khalat fī ʿibādihi wakhasira hunālika al-kāfirūna
